Intro: [C2 | G | Dm9 | G/B | C2 | G/B | F2 | Fmaj9]
Verse 1: [C2]My Savior’s [G2]sacri[Dm9]fice paid for [G/B]all my [C]sin So in my [G]suffer[Dm7]ing I look [G/B#]to the cross ag[Dm9]ain No [F2]need, no want, no [G]trial nor [Am]pain [Em7]Can compare to [F2]this The [F2]wrath of God, once [G]meant for [Am]me Was [Bb]all spent on [Gsus4 | G]Him
Chorus: Before the [G]Cross,[F] [ ]I humbly [C]bow I place my [G]trust[F] [ ]in the [F/C]Sav[C]ior [Dm/C C] Your finished [G]work[F] [ ]captures my [C/E]gaze [F] [F] [ ]You bore the [Am7]wrath,[G] [ ]I know the [C2 | G | Dm9 | F2]grace
Verse 2: [C]In my [G]darkest [Dm9]hour, Your presence [G/B]is my [C]peace In my [G]days of [Dm9]joy, Your grace [G/B]carries [Am7]me [F]Jesus, my [G]Great High [Am]Priest The [Em7]One who pleads for [F2]me My [F]heart is filled with [G]faith in [Am]You Here at [Bb]Calvary, on my [Gsus4 | G]knees
